title: Instructional Design Workshop for Fraction Concept Formation in Children with Learning Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A program for in-service and pre-service teachers aiming to cultivate special education professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three fraction concept teaching strategies tailored to the cognitive characteristics of learners with learning disabilities
Learners can utilize two types of fraction representation tools designed for learners with visual-motor integration differences
Reflective analysis allows diagnosing the learner's developmental stages of fraction understanding in three phases
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
